tool_description: Use our API to flag possible inappropriate / nude / adult content in videos and images.
name: NSFW Video Detector
title: NSFW Video Detector

api_list.name: NSFW
api_list.description: Examine video (MP4, AVI, MPEG-TS) or image (JPEG, PNG) for possible inappropriate content.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nsfw-video-detector.p.rapidapi.com/nsfw"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nsfw-video-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
